sentences.english: The meeting was held in Windsor Toya Hotel, Lake Toya.
sentences.chinese: 對話會議在洞爺湖畔的溫莎飯店舉行。

sentences.english: The beautiful West Lake, is there a fairy tale of love in the growth?
sentences.chinese: 美麗的西子湖畔，是否會有愛情的童話在生長？

sentences.english: In fact, I am the Summerrain Lotus by the Daming Lake.
sentences.chinese: 其實，我就是大明湖畔的夏雨荷。

sentences.english: The company is located in the beautiful Dianchi Lake.
sentences.chinese: 公司座落於美麗的滇池湖畔。

sentences.english: Fadell was building an energy-efficient home near Lake Tahoe.
sentences.chinese: 法德爾曾在塔霍湖畔修建了一幢節能房屋。

sentences.english: Think of yourself as the potential buyer looking at your lakefront house for the very first time.
sentences.chinese: 把你自己當成你的潛力湖畔的房子尋找買主第一次。

sentences.english: Ze-chen company was founded in 2008, located in the beautiful Dianchi Lake.
sentences.chinese: 澤臣公司成立於2008年，位於美麗的滇池湖畔。

sentences.english: The UNIL campus is located on the shores of Lake Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 洛桑大學坐落於日內瓦湖畔，遠眺阿爾卑斯山。

sentences.english: HengYe Medical Equipment Limited Company. Hangzhou is located beside the beautiful west lake.
sentences.chinese: 恆業生物工程有限公司位於美麗的西子湖畔。

sentences.english: One afternoon while we were there at that lake a thunderstorm came up.
sentences.chinese: 有天下午我們在湖畔時，來了一陣雷暴。

sentences.english: Planners also intend to remove some smaller commercial buildings around the lake.
sentences.chinese: 設計者還打算把一些較矮的商業建築搬離湖畔。

sentences.english: Next to it is one of the best grazing lands in Zhongdian.
sentences.chinese: 湖畔是中甸最好的牧場之一。

sentences.english: What is the latitude and longitude of the N-arrow in the Symphony Lake?
sentences.chinese: 在交響樂湖畔N箭頭所指處的經度和緯度各是多少？

sentences.english: Our hotel is a three-star hotel located at the West Lake.
sentences.chinese: 我們飯店是一所位於西子湖畔的三星級涉外飯店。

sentences.english: Emperor, do you still remember Yuhe Xia of the Damimg Lake?
sentences.chinese: 皇上，您還記得當年大明湖畔的夏雨荷嗎？

sentences.english: She lives around the lake around Scarlet Devil Mansion.
sentences.chinese: 她住在紅魔館旁的霧之湖湖畔。

definition: Jinghu district of Wuhu city 蕪湖市|芜湖市[Wu2 hu2 shi4], Anhui
Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
edge of the water/waterside/shore (of sea, lake or river)
Yuehu district of Yingtan city 鷹潭市|鹰潭市, Jiangxi
